ARCaptcha.description: ARCaptcha is a CAPTCHA system designed to enhance online security by preventing automated bots from accessing websites.

AWS WAF Captcha.description: AWS WAF Captcha helps block unwanted bot traffic by requiring users to successfully complete challenges before their web request are allowed to reach AWS WAF protected resources.

Accertify.description: Accertify is a platform specialising in fraud prevention and chargeback management.

Akamai Bot Manager.description: Akamai Bot Manager detect bots using device fingerprinting bot signatures.

Akamai Web Application Protector.description: Akamai Web Application Protector is designed for companies looking for a more automated approach to web application firewall (WAF) and distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) security.

Alibaba Cloud Verification Code.description: Alibaba Cloud Verification Code is a security feature provided by Alibaba Cloud to help protect user accounts from unauthorised access.

Altcha.description: Altcha is a spam and abuse protection solution for websites and apps, offering a privacy-friendly Captcha and other tools designed with GDPR compliance to provide strong security while safeguarding user privacy.

AntiBot.Cloud.description: AntiBot.Cloud is a PHP script and cloud service to protect websites from bots and junk traffic.

adCAPTCHA.description: adCAPTCHA is a security tool that integrates marketing and user experience to block bots while enhancing brand visibility, using dynamic content for varied challenges without collecting user data.

Basic.description: Basic is an authetication method used by some web servers.

Blue Triangle.description: Blue Triangle is a connected view of marketing, web performance, and third-party tag analytics while constantly monitoring website code for security vulnerabilities.

Bugcrowd.description: Bugcrowd is a crowdsourced cybersecurity platform.

BuySafe.description: BuySafe is a website seal that signifies adherence to stringent safety standards, ensuring secure online transactions and safeguarding user data.

Clear.description: Clear is a platform that offers secure identity verification.

ClickCease.description: ClickCease is an ad fraud and click-fraud detection and protection service software.

Cloud Guard.description: CloudGuard is a cybersecurity solutions provider focused on cloud security.

Cloudflare Bot Management.description: Cloudflare bot management solution identifies and mitigates automated traffic to protect websites from bad bots.

Cloudflare Turnstile.description: Turnstile is Cloudflare's smart CAPTCHA alternative.

CoinHive Captcha.description: Coinhive Captcha provides captcha service that is simple to integrate, where your users’ devices need to solve a number of hashes, adjustable by you, in order to login or post a comment to your site.

Combahton FlowShield.description: Combahton FlowShield is a network security solution designed to protect networks and servers from various cyber threats, including DDoS attacks, malware, and other types of malicious traffic.

Confiant.description: Confiant is a cybersecurity company specialising in ad security and ad quality assurance for digital publishers, programmatic platforms, and advertisers.

DDoS-Guard.description: DDoS-Guard is a Russian Internet infrastructure company which provides DDoS protection, content delivery network services, and web hosting services.

DataDome.description: DataDome is a cybersecurity platform that specialises in bot protection and mitigation, offering advanced solutions to safeguard websites and mobile applications against malicious bot traffic, credential stuffing, scraping, and other automated threats.

Dataships.description: Dataships is a platform that ensures compliance with global data privacy regulations, helping businesses manage and protect customer data according to international standards.

Detectify.description: Detectify is an automated scanner that checks your web application for vulnerabilities.

Digest.description: Digest is an authentication method based on a MD5 hash used by web servers.

Drata.description: Drata is an automated site compliance system designed to streamline and manage security and privacy requirements.

Forter.description: Forter is a SaaS company that provides fraud prevention technology for online retailers and marketplaces.

Fortinet FortiGate.description: Fortinet FortiGate is a family of network security appliances that provide firewall, VPN, intrusion prevention, antivirus, web filtering, and other security features to protect and secure networks and data.

Fraud Blocker.description: Fraudblocker is an ad fraud and click-fraud detection and protection service software.

FraudLabs Pro.description: FraudLabs Pro is a fraud prevention service offered by the company FraudLabs Pro, which specialises in online fraud detection and risk management for businesses.

Friendly Captcha.description: Friendly Captcha is a proof-of-work based solution in which the user’s device does all the work.

FunCaptcha.description: FunCaptcha is a type of CAPTCHA, which is a security measure used to protect websites and online services from spam, bots, and other forms of automated abuse.

GeeTest.description: GeeTest is a CAPTCHA and bot management provider, protects websites, mobile apps, and APIs from automated bot-driven attacks, like ATO, credential stuffing, web scalping, etc.

HSTS.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

Hanko.description: Hanko is a passwordless authentication solution offering secure login integration.

Human Presence.description: Human Presence is a bot detection and spam protection software for WordPress and Shopify.

hCaptcha.description: hCaptcha is an anti-bot solution that protects user privacy and rewards websites.

Imperva.description: Imperva is a cyber security software and services company for networking, data, and application security.

Imunify360.description: Imunify360 is a comprehensive security platform for Linux web servers which utilises machine learning technology and other advanced techniques to provide protection against various types of cyber threats, such as malware, viruses, and other attacks.

iThemes Security.description: iThemes Security(formerly known as Better WP Security) plugin enhances the security and protection of your WordPress website.

Jumio.description: Jumio is an online mobile payments and identity verification company that provides card and ID scanning and validation products for mobile and web transactions.

Kasada.description: Kasada is a cybersecurity company that provides a platform to protect websites and web applications from bot attacks and malicious activities.

Kerberos.description: Kerberos is an authentication method commonly used by Windows servers

Keybase.description: Keybase is for keeping everyone's chats and files safe, from families to communities to companies. MacOS, Windows, Linux, iPhone, and Android.

Konduto.description: Konduto is a fraud detection service for ecommerce.

Kount.description: Kount is a suite of fraud detection and prevention solutions for ecommerce businesses.

Limit Login Attempts Reloaded.description: Limit Login Attempts Reloaded stops brute-force attacks and optimizes your site performance by limiting the number of login attempts that are possible through the normal login as well as XMLRPC, Woocommerce and custom login pages.

MTCaptcha.description: MTCaptcha is a captcha service that is GDPR and WCAG compliant, providing the confidence of privacy and accessibility.

NTLM.description: NTLM is an authentication method commonly used by Windows servers

NexusPIPE.description: NexusPIPE is a ADC and DDoS mitigation Company.

NoFraud.description: NoFraud is a fraud prevention solution for ecommerce businesses.

Norton Shopping Guarantee.description: Norton Shopping Guarantee offering a third-party shopping guarantee to customers provides added protection and validation that you are safe to buy from.

Onfido.description: Onfido is a technology company that helps businesses verify people's identities using a photo-based identity document, a selfie and artificial intelligence algorithms.

PerimeterX.description: PerimeterX is a provider of scalable, behavior-based threat protection technology for the web, cloud, and mobile.

Proxmox Mail Gateway.description: Proxmox Mail Gateway is a mail security and anti-spam solution designed to protect email servers and ensure secure and reliable email communication.

RapidSec.description: RapidSec offers automated client-side security and monitoring.

Riskified.description: Riskified is a privately held company that provides SaaS fraud and chargeback prevention technology.

reCAPTCHA.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

SPNEGO.description: SPNEGO is an authentication method commonly used in Windows servers to allow NTLM or Kerberos authentication.

Sift.description: Sift is a CA-based fraud prevention company.

Signifyd.description: Signifyd is a provider of an enterprise-grade fraud technology solution for ecommerce stores.

SiteGuard WP Plugin.description: SiteGurad WP Plugin is the plugin specialised for the protection against the attack to the management page and login.

SiteLock.description: SiteLock is a security service that protects websites from hackers, malware, and other threats.

Skyflow.description: Skyflow is a company that provides a secure data privacy platform and API.

Slider Captcha.description: Slider Captcha is a free service that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

SnapHost.description: SnapHost is a solution offering anti-spam CAPTCHA web form protection.

Sqreen.description: Sqreen is the application security platform for the modern enterprise. Acquired by Datadog in Apr 2021.

StarTest.description: StarTest is a CAPTCHA provider that safeguards websites, mobile apps, and APIs from automated bot-driven attacks.

Sucuri.description: Sucuri is a cybersecurity company that provides website security solutions and services.

Testflow.description: Testflow is a platform that digitizes manual workflows for test centers while ensuring secure patient data management in compliance with data protection regulations.

ThreatMetrix.description: LexisNexis ThreatMetrix is an enterprise solution for online risk and fraud protection ('digital identity intelligence and digital authentication').

TruValidate.description: TransUnion TruValidate (previously ReputationShield/IDVision from iovation) is an online risk and fraud detection platform.

VAPTCHA.description: VAPTCHA is the abbreviation of (Variation Analysis based Public Turing Test to Tell Computers and Humans Apart), also known as gesture verification code, is a human-machine verification solution based on artificial intelligence and big data.

Vanta.description: Vanta is a compliance automation platform for SOC 2, HIPAA, ISO 27001, PCI, and GDPR.

Variti.description: Variti is a network security solutions firm that blocks bad bots, protects users from various automated abuse, attacks and fraud techniques.

VentryShield.description: VentryShield offers DDoS Protected VPS and Web Hosting.

Very Good Security.description: Very Good Security (VGS) is a data security and compliance platform that enables developers to securely handle sensitive data by encrypting, tokenising, and transmitting it through an intermediary service.

v4Guard Checkpoint.description: Checkpoint is a product of v4Guard that verifies website users and prevents fraudulent access to sensitive areas, by checking for any use of anonymisation services with a captcha-like widget.

Wordfence.description: Wordfence is a security plugin for sites that use WordPress. Wordfence includes an endpoint firewall and malware scanner.

Wordfence Login Security.description: Wordfence Login Security contains a subset of the functionality found in the full Wordfence plugin: Two-factor Authentication, XML-RPC Protection and Login Page CAPTCHA.

Yandex SmartCaptcha.description: Yandex SmartCaptcha is a service for verifying queries to identify user requests and block bots.
